channel.title: CVE Feed for pyhtml2pdf -- pyhtml2pdf
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pyhtml2pdf -- pyhtml2pdf

item.title: CVE-2024-1647|2024-02-19T23:59:17.082Z -- pyhtml2pdf -- pyhtml2pdf
item.description:
Pyhtml2pdf version 0.0.6 allows an external attacker to remotely obtain
arbitrary local files. This is possible because the application does not
validate the HTML content entered by the user.
